channel.title: Devolution, a good source but need's constant restarts
channel.description: Any one kind enough to post why i can't leave my dedi running my server without devolutions DROPS SHUTTING OFF?

item.description:

it’s dumb i get the null thing aswell but it stops after about 10 minutes but the drops never come back on…

item.title: Devolution, a good source but need's constant restarts
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I don’t know, I have this problem too.
But I also have a Crash detector, that runs the server.
It doesn’t work 100% but does its job sometimes.

Recently, players accounts have been getting nulled (completely whiped out)
and The server will start printing randomly
null
null
null
null
null
null
Which means it needs a restart cuz it doesn’t stop and it
laggs the shit outta the server.

That’s why, with my new source, it aint devo

Read full topic
